original_text: Then Mordecai went out from the presence of the king in royal robes of blue and white, with a great golden crown and a robe of fine linen and purple, and the city of Susa shouted and rejoiced.
korean_text: 모르드개가 푸르고 흰 조복을 입고 큰 금관을 쓰고 자색 가는 베 겉옷을 입고 왕 앞에서 나오니 수산 성이 즐거이 부르며 기뻐하고

sentences.original_text: Then Mordecai went out from the presence of the king
in royal robes of blue and white
and a robe of fine linen and purple
and the city of Susa shouted and rejoiced.
